A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Was looking forward to this movie after really enjoying The Force Awakens. Unfortunately this movie did not live up to expectations. Although it is an enjoyable movie\, it doesn’t feel like a “Star Wars” movie in the vein of the original trilogy. The awkward attempts at humor\, especially in the first scene with Luke didn’t sit well. There were some non-sensical plot elements if you take the time to analyze them\, but most movie goers probably just enjoy the ride. My biggest point of contention was the treatment of Luke. It just didn’t seem to be a fitting end for his story ark. I understand part of the theme of this movie is “forgetting the past” so Disney can be free to write new paths forward\, but Luke deserved a better ending.
